27616.en:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>I went to Cat Island to report about
Hippo Sardon, but Momma turned me
away.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「猫島に　ヒポポ・サードンのことを
　報告に行ったんニャが　マンマーさまに
　追い返されちまったのニャ～。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 히포포 서돈에 대해 보고하려고
　고양이섬에 갔다가 맘마 님께 쫓겨났다냥.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>我到猫岛去报告

46108.en:

　쓸데없는 소리를 하는 바람에…….<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46108.zh-Hans:

46109.en:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>So I tried to find and defeat Sardon,

46109.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: 그래서 서돈을 찾아서

46109.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>所以我才想努力
